description.en:
Bloodlust is a gameplay changing mod inspired by Max Payne 1 "New-York Minute" mode when you must finish the whole game before timer stops at 00:00. Killing enemies helps to slow countdown.

This mod has same gameplay mechanics, but without timer.

Max gets damage in small period until he dies. To stop or slow this problem you MUST kill enemies and run fast. Stop = Death.

Special thanks to AntiEvil and The Silver for coding help. Without those guys I did nothing working about this mod. So, you can think that it's an AntiEvil and The Silver mod too, lol.

This sound mod replaces all gunfire, handling and reload sounds and many other item sounds in Max Payne 2 (PC) with those from Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.
Read the installation instructions provided within the download to learn how to use it.

There's an alternate version for the Steyr SSG-69 (Sniper Rifle) gunfire within the files that has no bolt-action sounds. To learn how to use it, check the installation instructions.
Contains gunfire audio, reload/handling audio, grenade audio, Molotov audio, weapon melee audio, inventory/weapon select and menu audio.

Mod provided as loose, .ras and .mp2m files.

Fight styles
Gunslinger-Style allow you use some gunkata special moves
Trickster-Style allow you use some special moves to dodge ememy attacks
Sword Master-Style allow you use Sword for close combat and bullet block

Enemies
Obcessed Mercs-Mercenaries obcessed by a devils.
Demons-demons from hell. They use close combat to kill Dante

Other Features
Gibbing system - every enemy gibbing on dying
Red Orbs - pick up red orbs to get Green Orb and add health
New anims - Shooting, Sword moves, Special moves
New playble characters - Dante (with various models), Lady
This mod will give you to feel like a daredevil from Marvel

"Feel the Payne" aims at more realism and a higher difficulty. It adds new weapons and features to the game, fixes some bugs from the original game and improves many visuals with edited models and new textures.
For a complete list of changes read the included ReadMe files and/or the description of an attached download. If you want to check out the new textures and edited models, check out the screenshots.
The download includes very detailed installation instructions and descriptions in english and german languages.

Note: This is the Beta release of project "Feel the Payne" and not all files have been tested excessively. All content is open to future updates and improvements. If you find any bugs or if you have any ideas, leave a comment or send me a private message.

This gameplay mod is completely compatible with any of my sound mods.

Hardcore mod adds new 6 difficulties which are makes Max Payne 2 game harder than usual. Enemy can kill you with 1-2 shots, you can't use slow motion (only in hardest difficulties).
Authors:
AntiEvil - main script coding, hud coding.
DeXiaZ - hud recoding, loading&menu pictures, difficulty names; main script recoding for Hardcore (DV).
